content: > join my facebook group for community > coupons and cal challenges > > take me to the group 1 yarn lion brand yarn ferris wheel medium weight #4 yarn 100% acrylic 270 yds/247 m per 3 oz/85 g cake morning java x 2 cakes hook & other materials us size h/8 5 00 mm crochet hook scissors yarn needle sizes/finished measurements 12 around 6 flat x 56 long stitch key chain s = chain s single_crochet = single_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet slip_stitch = slip_stitch st s = stitch es notes scarf worked in joined rounds to form a tube stitch pattern can be replicated in multiples of 10 and any row multiple adjust length of pattern by working row repeat then measure as you go until desired length is reached pattern may be worked in other yarn weights and types as desired measure as you go to check results 1 https //www facebook com/groups/groupsalenabacacrochet/
